alert.note: Alert for Oldham; Shelby (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 4:27PM EDT until April 30 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Oldham County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Shelby County in central Kentucky... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 426 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just northwest of Crestwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, La Grange, Crestwood, Orchard Grass Hills, Pewee Valley, Chestnut Grove, Demplytown, Buckner, Floydsburg and Ballardsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
